channel.title: The Vanilla JS Podcast
channel.description: A show about JavaScript for people who hate the complexity of modern front‑end web development.
channel.itunes:subtitle: A show about JavaScript for people who hate the complexity of modern front‑end web development.
channel.itunes:summary: A show about JavaScript for people who hate the complexity of modern front‑end web development.
channel.itunes:author: Chris Ferdinandi

item.title: Episode 36 - The web is getting slower
